casebody.data:
Julian R. HOOD, Jr., petitioner,
v.
Megan J. BRENNAN, Postmaster General ; and Julian R. Hood, Jr., petitioner,
v.
Megan J. Brennan, Postmaster General. No. 15-9443. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 3, 2016.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.
